Since we already broke the streams... fix it in head

This is actually a slightly different scenario from originally fixed.  In that 
one the NPE was from deleting the PropertyEventInvocation and its 
PropertyEvents in the tree.  This is from the JavaBean being deleted together 
with its events.  
However ... that's no excuse for me not testing this, so my bad.  If put the 
check in JavaBeanTreeEditPart AND I did some more testing of other scenarios 
and I can't NPE anything now.  Released into head 12/5
